title: Fragment, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton 
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
creditline: Gift of W. and J. Sloane
description:
Framed pictures on a background of an oak tree.
Three vignettes within rectangular frames with allegorical scenes. Background formed by the broadly spreading branches of an oak tree from which the rectangular frames appear to hang like pictures.

tombstone.epitaph:
